title: Five Front Doors
description: The follow-up to the hugely popular Kitchen House. Just like a house canâ€™t have enough kitchens, you can never have too many front entryways.
quote: The first thing I think when I look at this house is not enough front doors.
altHero: Peter, Joe, Cleveland, and Quagmire in overalls and hard hats
alt2: the gang next to a cart with five doors and they each have a sledge-hammer
